thread.section_title: Restaurant Equipment Club Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Restaurant Equipment Club | restaurantequipmentclub.com
thread.title: Julian
thread.title_full: Restaurant Equipment Club reviewed by Julian

author: Julian
title: Julian
text:
I bought a Walk-in freezer with REC and they had one of the better prices on this particular freezer, if not the best, after i did all my research. But anyone can sell restaurant equipment. The real reason REC gets a Five Star review, from me, is the service. Specifically, Gwyn Panno assisted me and was very helpful, informative, and friendly throughout the whole process. Also, we had an issue with the freight company during our delivery and Gwyn stepped in and helped resolve the issue very quickly.
I was satisfied with my experience with REC and will go back to them if I ever need anymore restaurant equipment.
